description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a web application, including responsive design and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application class that styles the primary container with theme variables.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation for spinning.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the application, setting background and alignment.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, utilizing theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
